20101231211126.000|20101231211128.000|TR0|new survey from NPD Group that says that 
20101231211128.000|20101231211131.000|TR0|21 percent of TVs that were actually sold

20101231215514.000|20101231215516.000|TR0|Charles.  She is "On the Case" for us

20101231215519.000|20101231215521.000|TR0|
20101231215521.000|20101231215523.000|TR0|So, Midwin, is this legal?
20101231215523.000|20101231215526.000|TR0|
20101231215526.000|20101231215528.000|TR0|MIDWIN CHARLES, CRIMINAL DEFENSE ATTORNEY: 
20101231215528.000|20101231215531.000|TR0| Well, I could certainly see how there are 
20101231215531.000|20101231215533.000|TR0|going to be some challenges to this, 
20101231215533.000|20101231215535.000|TR0|Brianna.  I mean, we do have a Fourth 
20101231215535.000|20101231215538.000|TR0|Amendment right against unreasonable 
20101231215538.000|20101231215540.000|TR0|search and seizure.  And this, to me, 
20101231215540.000|20101231215542.000|TR0|sounds a little bit extreme.
20101231215542.000|20101231215545.000|TR0|
20101231215545.000|20101231215547.000|TR0|I understand that law enforcement has to 
20101231215547.000|20101231215550.000|TR0|do what is necessary, or at least attempt 
20101231215550.000|20101231215552.000|TR0|to try to solve the problem of DUI.  There 
20101231215552.000|20101231215554.000|TR0|has been many fatalities.  And over the 
20101231215554.000|20101231215557.000|TR0|years, they have really stepped up in 
20101231215557.000|20101231215559.000|TR0|terms of regulation and laws, and also 
20101231215559.000|20101231215602.000|TR0|advertising and promotions to let people 
20101231215602.000|20101231215604.000|TR0|know that this is a serious, serious 
20101231215604.000|20101231215606.000|TR0|crime.  But I think that this goes a 
20101231215606.000|20101231215609.000|TR0|little bit too far in trying to achieve 
20101231215609.000|20101231215611.000|TR0|those goals.
